Header: Suspects who defamed Police bailed out
Content: Vavuniya Court ordered the individuals linked to the incident of uploading a video to the internet defaming Police, to appear before Courts again the 24th of this month.Two youth had recorded a video depicting a bribe being given to a Police replica on Vavuniya â€“ Jaffna, A 9 Road, and uploaded it into the Internet. Police arrested him on the charges of tempting the public to give bribes and defaming Police. The suspects were produced in Vavuniya Courts and later they were bailed out.
